section.p: Provides an indication of the medical specialty of the organization-location. Examples include Allergy, Neurology, Cardiology, etc. This is equivalent to File 42.4 in Vista.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] specialtyCode with data type Code
Identifies the Specialty

Contains exactly one [1..1] address with data type Address
The person's office address. First choice for business related contacts during business hours.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
A unique string or token used to identify the organization

Contains exactly one [1..1] name with data type String
The name of the organization.

Contains exactly one [1..1] specialtyCode with data type Code
Identifies the Specialty

Contains exactly one [1..1] asOrganizationalProvider, where its type is Organizational Provider
Represents information about an organization which is authorized to provide health care services.
